name: Vuori Tradewind Performance Tank - Men's
description: Sweat hard, vent hard. Vuori’s most technical tank, the Tradewind is dotted with micro perforations for ventilation, so you can get through every box jump, sprint and hot yoga class with ease. Flat seams move smoothly over your skin.Moisture-wicking polyester and spandex is breathable to keep you comfortable during high-output activites.Anti-odour treatment keeps you smelling fresh.Flatlock seams reduce chafing.
